property.Name: RootPanel1
property.AutoCaption: <root><item><expression>ZXhwPScoJytbe2VkdF8zfV0rJ8TqJytbe2NtYl8xfV0gKyfUwiknO29uUmVzdWx0PTE=</expression><expressioncondi>ZXhwPVt7Y21iXzF9XSA9IFt7Y21iXzJdIDtvblJlc3VsdD0x</expressioncondi><memo>起始月=终止月</memo></item><item><expression>ZXhwPScoJytbe2VkdF8zfV0rJ8TqJytbe2NtYl8xfV0gKyehqycrW3tjbWJfMn1dICsn1MIpJztvblJlc3VsdD0x</expression><expressioncondi>ZXhwPVt7Y21iXzF9XSAhPSBbe2NtYl8yfV0gO29uUmVzdWx0PTE=</expressioncondi><memo>起始月!=终止月</memo></item></root>
property.MinSumParam: 11PROJECT_CODE=项目代码2SUBPROJECT_CODE=小合同代码3BUSINESS_YEAR=进度所属年份4BUSINESS_MONTH=进度所属月份SCHDULE_CONTENT=分项工程内容1BUSINESS_YEAR=进度所属年份2BUSINESS_MONTH=进度所属月份NAME_BUSINESS_MONTH=进度所属月份(显示用)
property.Percentage: <root><item><field>FINISH_COSTRATE</field><expression>CASE YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE(YFISNULL(FINISH_COSTAMOUNT,0) / YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0)) * 100 END</expression><cnexpression>累计完工进度造价/分项工程合同造价(合计)</cnexpression></item></root>

property.Name: ctrl_56
property.Columns: 复合字段CODEfalsefalse居中字符型<event><type>A</type><moduleid>00003113</moduleid><inparam>formQmid=BILLID;openmode=1;version=1;styleInfo=</inparam><outparam></outparam></event>120进度单号不需要合计falsefalsetruefalseNAME_BUSINESS_YEARfalsetrue居中字符型45年份不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalseNAME_BUSINESS_MONTHfalsetrue居中字符型40月份不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalseLINK_QMfalsetrue居中字符型<event><type>A</type><moduleid>00003113</moduleid><inparam>formQmid=BILLID;openmode=1;version=1;styleInfo=</inparam><outparam></outparam></event>66查看=1.00000000,进度单不需要合计falsefalsetruefalsePROJECT_NAMEfalsetrue字符型250项目名称不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalseSUBPROJECT_NAMEfalsetrue字符型<event><type>A</type><moduleid>26020020</moduleid><inparam>originalCodeFieldName=SUBPROJECT_CODE;module_id=26020020;;moduleId=26020020</inparam><outparam></outparam></event>250合同名称不需要合计falsefalsetruefalseSEQUENCE_NOfalsetrue居中字符型40序号不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalseSCHDULE_CONTENTfalsetrue字符型150分项工程不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalsePROJECT_STATUSfalsefalse居中字符型66完工情况不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalseSUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNTfalsefalse2居右数字型105分项合同价需要合计truefalsefalsefalseSTART_COSTAMOUNTfalsetrue2居右字符型105上期累计进度||造价不需要合计truefalsefalsefalseSTART_COSTRATEfalsetrue居右数字型105上期累计进度||百分比%不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalseSCHDULE_FLOAT4falsetrue2居右数字型105本期进度||现场申报进度需要合计truefalsefalsefalseSCHDULE_FLOAT5falsetrue2居右数字型105本期进度||监理确认进度需要合计truefalsefalsefalseMONTH_COSTAMOUNTfalsetrue2居右字符型105本期进度||甲方确认进度需要合计truefalsefalsefalseMONTH_COSTRATEfalsetrue居右数字型105本期进度||百分比%不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalseFINISH_COSTAMOUNTfalsetrue2居右字符型105期末累计进度||造 价不需要合计truefalsefalsefalseFINISH_COSTRATEfalsetrue2居右数字型105期末累计进度||百分比%不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalseBANLANCE_YESAMOUNT_SUMfalsetrue2居右字符型105财务结算金额||上期已结算不需要合计truefalsefalsefalseBANLANCE_NOTAMOUNT_SUMfalsetrue2居右字符型105财务结算金额||本期需结算需要合计truefalsefalsefalseBANLANCE_SUMAMOUNT_SUMfalsetrue2居右字符型105财务结算金额||累计结算不需要合计truefalsefalsefalseAPPLY_USER_NAMEfalsetrue居中字符型55编制人不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalseAPPLY_DATEfalsetrue居中字符型80编制日期不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalseFLOW_FINISHSTATUSfalsetrue居中字符型66审批状态不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalsePROJECT_DEPTfalsetrue字符型150项目部门不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalsePROJECT_LEADERfalsetrue居中字符型66项目经理不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalseBUDGET_DESCfalsetrue字符型250备注不需要合计falsefalsefalsefalse

property.Modules: <event><type>A</type><moduleid>00005001</moduleid><inparam>alias=PUB_PROJECT;isMultiPage=0;selectType=1;getDataTime=1;isBottom=0;showType=0;expendAll=1;showCode=0;returnFields=CODE,NAME,PROJECT_DEPT;windowparam=formtitle:选择项目||width:720||height:621||field:项目代码\bCODE\b140\byes\bno\b,项目名称\bNAME\b350\byes\byes\bPROJECT_NAME\c项目编码/苗圃/研究院,项目部\bPROJECT_DEPT\b180\byes\bno\b;othcondi=Q09ERSAgbGlrZSAnMDElJyBhbmQgUFJPSkVDVF9CT1RUT01CWiA9ICcxJyBhbmQgIChwcm9qZWN0X3N0YXR1c19jb2RlIT0nMicgYW5kIHByb2plY3Rfc3RhdHVzX2NvZGUhPSdRJyk=</inparam><outparam>PROJECT_NAME=NAME:项目名称</outparam></event>

property.Name: RootPanel1
property.AutoCaption: <root><item><expression>ZXhwPScoJytbe2VkdF8zfV0rJ8TqJytbe2N0cmxfNzl9XSArJ9TCKSc7b25SZXN1bHQ9MA==</expression><expressioncondi>ZXhwPVt7ZWR0XzN9XSA9IFt7ZWR0XzR9XSAgYW5kIFt7Y3RybF83OX1dID0gW3tjdHJsXzg5fV0gO29uUmVzdWx0PTA=</expressioncondi><memo>起始年=终止年 AND 起始月=终止月</memo></item><item><expression>ZXhwPScoJytbe2VkdF8zfV0rJ8TqJytbe2N0cmxfNzl9XSArJ9TCoasnK1t7ZWR0XzR9XSsnxOonK1t7Y3RybF84OX1dICsn1MIpJztvblJlc3VsdD0w</expression><expressioncondi>ZXhwPVt7ZWR0XzN9XSAhPSBbe2VkdF80fV07b25SZXN1bHQ9MA==</expressioncondi><memo>起始年!=终止年</memo></item><item><expression>JygnK1t7ZWR0XzN9XSsnxOonK1t7Y3RybF83OX1dICsnoasnK1t7Y3RybF84OX1dICsn1MIpJw==</expression><expressioncondi>ZXhwPVt7ZWR0XzN9XSA9IFt7ZWR0XzR9XSAgYW5kIFt7Y3RybF83OX1dICE9IFt7Y3RybF84OX1dIDtvblJlc3VsdD0w</expressioncondi><memo>起始年=终止年 AND 起始月!=终止月</memo></item></root>
property.MinSumParam: 11BUSINESS_YEAR=进度所属年份NAME_BUSINESS_YEAR=进度所属年份(显示用)1BUSINESS_YEAR=进度所属年份2BUSINESS_MONTH=进度所属月份NAME_BUSINESS_MONTH=进度所属月份(显示用)
property.Expression: <root><item><field>SIGN_VIEW_BUDGET</field><expression>CASE WHEN YFISNULL(STANDBY_FLOAT4,0)=0 THEN '1' else '0' END</expression><cnexpression></cnexpression></item><item><field>FINISH_DIFFERAMOUNT</field><expression>YFISNULL(FINISH_FACTAMOUNT,0) - YFISNULL(FINISH_COSTAMOUNT,0)</expression><cnexpression>实际进度）累计完工造价 - 累计完工进度造价</cnexpression></item><item><field>MONTH_DIFFERAMOUNT</field><expression>YFISNULL(MONTH_FACTAMOUNT,0) - YFISNULL(MONTH_COSTAMOUNT,0)</expression><cnexpression>实际进度）本期完工造价 - 本期完工进度造价</cnexpression></item><item><field>FLOAT_HZ</field><expression>YFISNULL(STANDBY_FLOAT1,0) + YFISNULL(STANDBY_FLOAT2,0) + YFISNULL(STANDBY_FLOAT3,0)</expression><cnexpression></cnexpression></item><item><field>START_DIFFERAMOUNT</field><expression>YFISNULL(START_FACTAMOUNT,0) - YFISNULL(START_COSTAMOUNT,0)</expression><cnexpression>实际进度）上期累计完工造价 - 上期累计完工进度造价</cnexpression></item></root>
property.Percentage: <root><item><field>FINISH_FACTRATE</field><expression>CASE YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE(YFISNULL(FINISH_FACTAMOUNT,0) / YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0)) * 100 END</expression><cnexpression>实际进度）累计完工造价/分项工程合同造价(合计)</cnexpression></item><item><field>MONTH_FACTRATE</field><expression>CASE YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE(YFISNULL(MONTH_FACTAMOUNT,0) / YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0)) * 100 END</expression><cnexpression>实际进度）本期完工造价/分项工程合同造价(合计)</cnexpression></item><item><field>START_FACTRATE</field><expression>CASE YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE(YFISNULL(START_FACTAMOUNT,0) / YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0)) * 100 END</expression><cnexpression>实际进度）上期累计完工造价/分项工程合同造价(合计)</cnexpression></item><item><field>MONTH_COSTRATE</field><expression>CASE YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE(YFISNULL(MONTH_COSTAMOUNT,0) / YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0)) * 100 END</expression><cnexpression>本期完工进度造价/分项工程合同造价(合计)</cnexpression></item><item><field>START_COSTRATE</field><expression>CASE YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE(YFISNULL(START_COSTAMOUNT,0) / YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0)) * 100 END</expression><cnexpression>上期累计完工进度造价/分项工程合同造价(合计)</cnexpression></item><item><field>FINISH_COSTRATE</field><expression>CASE YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE(YFISNULL(FINISH_COSTAMOUNT,0) / YFISNULL(SUBPROJECT_COSTAMOUNT,0)) * 100 END</expression><cnexpression>累计完工进度造价/分项工程合同造价(合计)</cnexpression></item></root>
